hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents one minute.

$9{:}25$ is $25$ minutes after $9{:}00$. 


[[☃ image 1]]

So, we move $25$ tick marks past $9{:}00$.

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 9:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 10:00.The fifth tick mark after 20 is labeled 9:25. An orange line moves right along the number line from 9:00 to 9:25. !

hints.content:
This number line shows $9{:}25$ graphed:



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 9:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 10:00. The fifth tick mark after 20 is labeled B. !

question.content:
**On which number line is $9{:}25$ graphed?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 9:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 10:00. The fifth tick mark after 10 is labeled A.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b1fb39c4f8dd1379a489d8989e5cfe4c82b1a4c9)

![A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 9:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 10:00.The fifth tick mark after 20 is labeled B.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/31285e2f9540e3eba037d87af02e5abe6607d1ae)
